definition: circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle
to confine/to lock up/to pen in
erhua variant of 羅圈|罗圈[luo2 quan1]
to bow around with hands joined (to people on all sides)
a quarrel in which third parties get involved

sentences.english: If you're worried that will cause bandy legs, you still hold him more.
sentences.chinese: 如果你擔心會引起羅圈腿，你還是多抱他。

sentences.english: Raise a bowlegged, see a piece of crocodilian mouth.
sentences.chinese: 擡起一條羅圈腿，看到一張鱷魚嘴。
